'''Oak Items''' are special items given to the player by [[Professor Oak]] as they progress through the game. These items act as permanent upgrades to the player's account. [[File:EmptyOak.png|right|No items selected]] [[File:FullOak.png|right|Items fully selected]] ==Usage== Each Oak Item is a permanent upgrade to the player's account. They buff stats and can be upgraded with constant use. Much like acquiring the items, player's start out with one slot that can be used to activate an Oak item. As players catch more Pokémon, more slots are unlocked. They are as follows: {| class="roundtable sortable" style="background: #{{items color light}}; border:3px solid #{{items color dark}}" ! Slot !
